## get

get [ config | secret ] entries

### Synopsis

```
get config/secret entries.

Examples:
  # get config table
  kl get config <configid>

	# get secret table
  kl get secret <secretid>

	# get config/secret in yaml format
  kl get [command] <id> -o yaml

	# get config/secret in json format
  kl get [command] <id> -o json
```
